conversion_verification.notes: A successful isometric 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and cutaway views.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation. High marks for wall thickness and volume. Full points for angle and projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Significant geometric hallucinations. The 2D plan is an open plan (Kitchen/Living/Dining); the 3D added non-existent partition walls. Bathroom shape and door locations were altered.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture represents the rooms well, but placement is impacted by the incorrect partition walls.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, but text labels and dimensions from the floorplan are baked onto the 3D floor/furniture, which clutters the presentation.

detected_errors.description: Added internal partition walls that do not exist in the source 2D floor plan.
Original text labels and dimensions are rendered onto the 3D geometry.

summary: While the 3D technical execution is high, the model hallucinates several structural walls that significantly alter the original open-plan layout.
